TEI.2.document_title: James W Breedlove to Stephen F Austin, 01-30-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: James W. Breedlove to Austin, New Orleans, January 30, 1830. Introducing Mr. McQuin [Mr. Queen?]. (Omitted.)
